title: Get details of a popular hashtag

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: Advertiser ID. Pass one of the advertiser IDs returned via advertiser_ids from /oauth2/access_token/ .

parameters.name: discovery_type
parameters.description: The type of discovery item. Currently, we only support HASHTAG .

parameters.name: hashtag_id
parameters.description: Hashtag ID. Pass in a hashtag ID that is returned via the /discovery/trending_list/ endpoint. If the hashtag you provide isn't included in the list returned by the /discovery/trending_list/ endpoint, you will receive an empty list in response. Example: 4268426520694 .

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: Location code. Specify the same country_code as the one you input in the /discovery/trending_list/ endpoint. If the country_code you provide is not associated with the hashtag, we will return an error. See Location code for the supported values. Example: DE .

parameters.name: date_range
parameters.description: The timeframe in which the items have been popular. Specify the same date_range as the one you input in the /discovery/trending_list/ endpoint. If the date_range you provide is not associated with the hashtag, we will return an error. Enum values: 1DAY : last 1 day. 7DAY : last 7 days. 30DAY : last 30 days. 120DAY : last 120 days.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: views
fields.description: The number of views for related videos that feature this hashtag in the selected region and timeframe. Example: 134333716.

fields.name: views_global_lifetime
fields.description: The number of views for related videos that feature this hashtag, globally and across their whole lifetime. Example: 91639649280.

fields.name: posts
fields.description: The number of posts for related videos that feature this hashtag in the selected region and timeframe. Example: 21856.

fields.name: posts_global_lifetime
fields.description: The number of posts for related videos that feature this hashtag, globally and across their whole lifetime. Example: 7846729.

fields.name: top_country_list
fields.description: The location codes of the top five locations in the world where this hashtag is most popular. To learn about the location that a location code represents, see Location code . Example: ["US", "GB", "PH", "CA", "DE"] .

fields.name: hashtag_status
fields.description: The status of the hashtag. Enum values: ONLINE : available for ad creation. OFFLINE : unavailable for ad creation.

fields.name: trending_history
fields.description: The historical ranking data for the hashtag, spanning up to the past 30 days.

fields.name: date
fields.description: Date, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD . Example: 2024-01-01 .

fields.name: rank_position_daily
fields.description: The rank position of the hashtag among hashtags across all categories or industries in the selected region ( country_code ) on the date. Example: 73 . Note : If the hashtag does not perform well compared to the last time period, the hashtag will not be considered a trending hashtag and the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: views_daily
fields.description: The number of views for related videos that feature this hashtag in the selected region ( country_code ) on the date. Example: 39409290. Note : If the daily views are less than 1,000, the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: audience_insights
fields.description: Information about viewers that watch videos associated with this hashtag. Note : If hashtag_status is OFFLINE or the expected audience size for the hashtag is less than 1,000, audience_insights will be returned as empty.

fields.name: percentage
fields.description: The approximate percentage of viewers associated with different age groups.
